description: Try our easy to follow Lemon Roasted Chicken recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Lemon Roasted Chicken Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a pan over medium heat. Add remaining sage leaves and cook for 1 minute or until crisp. Drain on paper towel. Serve chicken with bread, vegetables and gravy. Garnish with sage.
